title: How Many Calories in a Ritz Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in ritz crackers, including full nutrition breakdown per cracker, macros, and serving tips for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Ritz Cracker?
assumptions: Original plain Ritz crackers; standard size (~3.2 g each); no added toppings or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, exact size, and any added ingredients; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A single Ritz cracker contains about 16 calories and 0.7 g of fat.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in ritz crackers per serving?
faqs.a: A standard serving of 5 Ritz crackers has about 80 calories.
One Ritz cracker has 2.2 g carbs, so they're moderate; 5 crackers total 11 g.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Ritz cracker?
faqs.a: About 27 mg per cracker, or 135 mg for 5.

faqs.q: Do Ritz crackers have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat; each cracker has 0 g.
Adding cheese can add 50+ calories per cracker, depending on type and amount.
